scripts.build: npm run generate-ts; npm run compile; npm run generate-jschema; npm run generate-python; npm run generate-csharp; npm run generate-java ; npm run generate-golang
scripts.generate-ts: mkdir -p src/lang/ts && cd schema && node ../../quicktype/target/index.js --lang typescript -s typscript ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts ./sample.ts -o ../src/lang/ts/envelope.ts
scripts.generate-jschema: mkdir -p src/lang/jschema && cd schema && node ../../quicktype/target/index.js --lang schema -s typescript ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts ./sample.ts -o ../src/lang/jschema/envelope.json
scripts.generate-python: mkdir -p src/lang/python && cd schema && node ../../quicktype/target/index.js --lang python -s python ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts ./sample.ts -o ../src/lang/python/envelope.py
scripts.generate-csharp: mkdir -p src/lang/csharp && cd schema && node ../../quicktype/target/index.js --lang csharp -s csharp ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts ./sample.ts -o ../src/lang/csharp/envelope.cs
scripts.generate-java: mkdir -p src/lang/java && cd schema && node ../../quicktype/target/index.js --lang java -s java ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts ./sample.ts -o ../src/lang/java/envelope.java
scripts.generate-golang: cd schema && node ../../quicktype/target/index.js --lang go -s go ./envelope.ts ./payload.ts ./sample.ts -o ../pkg/envelope.go --package c5
